rows.stringify: $(identity.pronouns.singular) will never say no to a duel.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) can see an opening in any defense.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) sees fighting as a solution to any problem.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) judges people on their fighting skills.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) used to be bullied as a child and learned to fight so that it wouldn't happen again.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) always has a battle story to tell.
